column4: Hello everyone. I am having major issues with multi-booting. Can anyone help? I can not boot into xubuntu, but it will boot into XP just fine. I don't think I have the partitions setup correctly
I had xubuntu work by it self, then I added a partition for xp (and installed it)
if you installed windows *after* ubuntu, it's probably over-written grub.  it's common enough 'n easy to fix.  https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows
